mapper.select: SELECT aa.emp_id, aa.emp_name, aa.emp_div, bb.emp_divname FROM tb_employee aa LEFT JOIN tb_emp_divname bb ON aa.emp_div = bb.emp_div WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND emp_pwd = #{empPwd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_login_info ( log_idx , emp_id , log_logindate ) VALUES ( seq_logininfo.nextval , #{empId} , SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_login_info SET log_logoutdate = SYSDATE WHERE log_idx = ( SELECT MAX(log_idx) FROM tb_login_info WHERE emp_id = #{empId} )
